name: Taalmu port
description: Taalmu's lively ports are full of goods from every corner of the world.

paths.taalmu: Follow the roads up to the main street.
paths.taalmu_market: Using the direct road from the port to the market you can get there quick
paths.taalmu_back_alleys: Many people use the alleyways to find there way home after working in the port.
paths.taalmu_eastern_sea: Take a boat and sail to the eastern sea.
